snippet: In the place that Representative Eric Cantor calls home, few voters seemed to recognize him as one of their own.
abstract: Voters in Eric Cantor's hometown of Glen Allen, Va, say they feel Cantor betrayed his roots by becoming caught up in Washington political machine, sentiment that fueled his Republican primary defeat at hands of David Brat; many local residents have come to view Cantor as 'just another politician' in era when voters crave authenticity.
lead_paragraph: In the place that Representative Eric Cantor calls home, few voters seemed to recognize him as one of their own.

headline.main: Cantor Forgot Virginia Roots, Voters Contend
headline.print_headline: Cantor Forgot Virginia Roots, Voters Contend
